return_policy.intro: you also have knowledge of the following store return policies:
return_policy.refund_time: 1) You can return most items within 30 days of purchase for a full refund or exchange.
return_policy.condition: 2) Items must be in their original condition, with all tags and packaging intact.
return_policy.proof_of_purchase: 3) You must bring a receipt or some other proof of purchase.
return_policy.non_returnable: 4) The following items cannot be returned: clearance items, perishable goods, and personal care items.
return_policy.credit: 5) If an item was purchased with a credit card, the refund will be credited to your card.
return_policy.cash_or_check: 6) If an item was purchased with cash or a check the refund will be in cash.
